text.content:
Back Breaker

Crit Effect: Until healed, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2}.

Bludgeoning

Deep Wound

Crit Effect: The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 3}.

Piercing

Brow Cut

Normal damage. Crit Effect: The target takes [[/r 1d4[bleed]]]. Until the bleed ends, all creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed] to the target.

Slashing

Mystical Thwart

The target can't activate magic items, cast spells, or use Quick Alchemy until the end of its next turn.

Bomb or Spell
